message.body: Good morning darling, happy Valentine's Day! Are you planning on going to yoga today and tomorrow, or just today?
Good morning! I can't go tomorrow b/c I'm leaving for Boston after work. I plan on going to tonight's class. You? Are you and Dan doing anything special

Hiii! We aren't doing anything special, but we haven't really seen each other this week so we just want to get some quality time :-) so I'm going to bail on yoga tonight--agh, sorry I keep ditching the Thursday class!!!
No worries! Maybe next Thursday? Or even next Friday with dinner after???
Ooh next friday with dinner after sounds great!! I hope you have fun in boston this weekend! Any fun vday plan with jamie?
Perfect! Can't wait for our little date! He and I decided to keep
it low key this year. I'm excited to hang out and relax
Yayyyy!!!! Thank you!! Ask James if he got his hahah
